resources.string: Current version <xliff:g id=\"minlength1\">%1$s</xliff:g>, New version <xliff:g id=\"minlength1\">%2$s</xliff:g>. Do you want to update YesPo?

Did not find the new version
Sorry, you network can not use the phone call, please change to 3G/4G/WiFi.
No internet connection, please check you network settings.
Network unavailable, please check your network settings.
Network unavailable, please check your network settings.
Network request failed. please try again latter.
No internet connection, please check you network settings.

1. Go to the WLAN setting on your mobile phone and check if there are available WLAN network.

2. Check the mobile phone if it is enabled cellular data network, and confirm that it is in service.

3. If you have accessed to WLAN, please check whether the WLAN network chosen contacts to internet and allows your device to access internet.
There´s a problem with your connection. Tap on \"Reload\" to try again..

Providing you with free interpretation services

YesPo has not yet assessed the abilities of this trainee

We suggest you choose a (higher quality) paid interpreter
Linguists around the world meet here
Making language and culture no longer an obstacle
Language and communication problems are no longer problems!
A human translator in your pocket
Click \"Sign Up\" means you agree to Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
Please wait while we verify your mobile number
<font color=\"#999999\">We will send a </font><font color=\"#169719\">verification code</font><font color=\"#999999\"> to the following number:</font>
It will take approximately <xliff:g id=\"minlength1\">%1$s</xliff:g> seconds to receive the message
Haven´t received code yet? Click on “Resend Code”
Mobile number cannot be the same as previous number
We have already sent the reset link to your email address: <font color=\"#036AAF\"><xliff:g id=\"minlength1\">%1$s</xliff:g></font>. Please check your email to reset password immediately
<font color=\"#999999\">We have sent the reset code to </font><font color=\"#169719\"><xliff:g id=\"minlength1\">%1$s</xliff:g></font><font color=\"#999999\"></font>
We have already sent the reset link to <font color=\"#036AAF\"><xliff:g id=\"minlength1\">%1$s</xliff:g></font> the following e-mail address
Set a password. Log in to YesPo using your new password.
Phone number has been Verify successfull
Your YesPo ID can only be changed once
If you have changed your email, you will need a link again
An email with a confirmation has send to:<font color=\"#036AAF\"><xliff:g id=\"minlength1\">%1$s</xliff:g></font>,Please verify
You YesPo ID has already been set and cannot be changed
Linking mobile number helps you find more friends on YesPo and increases account security
If link, you friend can through the phone number to find you
Through the phone number to find you
You have not linked your e-mail
We suggest you link e-mail for security purposes before you top up.
Enter e-mail address click \"OK\", we will send verification email for you.
Phone number must be in 5–15 digitr
Phone number must be in 5–15 digitr
Length of number must be between 5 and 15 digits
<font color=\"#636363\">You have success to get coupon </font><font color=\"#636363\"><xliff:g id=\"minlength1\">%1$s</xliff:g></font><font color=\"#636363\">.</font>
Enter a promotion code for a discount. You can skip this step if you don´t have one.
To help us get back to you quicker
Your opinions or suggestions are welcome!
Are you sure you wish to cancel block?
For payment details, tap on“Transaction History”

Funds withdrawal guidelines:
1. You can apply for funds withdrawal at any time. The amount applied for withdrawal will be frozen and unmodifiable
2. If applied for before the 15th day of the month, the amount will be transferred to your linked account at the end of the same month
3. If applied for after the 16th day of the month, the amount will be transferred to your linked account at the end of the next month
4. The amount of each application for withdrawal must be equal to or greater than USD50. For details on your income history and guidelines, please visit our website.
It is a 40% service charge for each order
Amount applied for transfer will be frozen until the day of transfer to your linked bank account.
Your balance transferred to your user account, which can be used for translation services, cannot be reversed back into your translator account. For more information, please see our website.
Applied for transfer：You income must more than USD50.
Has not yet been selected transfer account
Applied for transfer can not less than USD 50
You have not link transfer account
For security purposes, after linking your account, you must verify your PayPal email address via email
For security purposes, after linking your account, you must verify your PayPal email address via email.
You will get USD 1 for each new member who registers on YesPo and enters your invitation code
Get more rewards by:\n1.Telling your friends your invitation code\n2.Sharing your invitation code on social media.
Now your WeChat version is too low or not installed WeChat, need to install WeChat can be used
Now your Google+ version is too low or not installed Google+, need to install Google+ can be used
Now your Line version is too low or not installed Line, need to install Line can be used
Apply to become a YesPo translator，please enter email \" I want become translator \"send to the following email address: support@yespo.com\nYesPo team will contact you.
Notice: \nTo become a YesPo translator, you must ensure \"push notifications\" are enabled for the YesPo app
You are now connected to translator:
Verify your mobile number now to continue
Hello and welcome to YesPo! I am translator <xliff:g id=\"minlength1\">%1$s</xliff:g> at your service. You can start telling me what you need translated.
Chat started with <xliff:g id=\"minlength1\">%1$s</xliff:g>. Your chat will be saved for quality assurance purposes.
Call in progress - tap to return to call
Voice call in on. Try again later
Translation via Voice Call will cost you USD **/min
Has been copied to the clipboard
You are been waiting for <xliff:g id=\"minlength1\">%1$s</xliff:g> minutes,Continue waiting?
All our translators are busy at the moment. Please try again later.
If you were satisfied with the service provided by the translator, you can consider giving a tip.
Join us, We are wating for you!
Think great thoughts and you will be great!
Your profile have been verified， please file an application on our website if you need a modification
You account logged in on other device, we suggest you change password for security purposes.
Your chat has ended by user\nThanks for your translation service
Insufficient funds, after<xliff:g id=\"minlength1\">%1$s</xliff:g>minute chat will be ended.
Welcome to YesPo! Click here check more promotion.
Welcome to YesPo!\nGet more rewards by share on on social media!\nFollow us wecha official account :yespoGet more information and promotion about YesPo.

Your chat will end automatically in <xliff:g id=\"minlength1\">%1$s</xliff:g> minute
